fact: HIS STORY STARTED WITH A BALL IN A TUBE
BEFORE SEGA LANDED ON A HEDGEHOG, SONIC WAS A RABBIT
THE CHARACTER HAD SOME FAMOUS INFLUENCES
AND LED AN INTERESTING SOCIAL LIFE
POP ART WAS A BIG INFLUENCE ON THE GAME
THE GAME’S SOUNDTRACK WAS COMPOSED BY A BIG-NAME JAPANESE BAND
SONIC’S ARCHENEMY WENT BY MANY NAMES
THE GAME MIGHT TAKE PLACE ON THE WEST COAST
SONIC LIVED UP TO HIS SPEEDY REPUTATION
BUT TECHNICALLY, SONIC HIMSELF WASN’T ALL THAT FAST
THE GAME INCLUDES A HIDDEN MESSAGE
Sonic Forces was the first Sonic game to allow players to make their own character!
